hero.title: Web Developer
hero.description: Check my work and contact me below

about.description: Hi, Welcome! I'm your passionate frontend developer and digital strategist, based in Germany (NRW) and the beautiful Switzerland. With my small family, I travel the world and work flexibly – whether remotely or at my inspiring Razor-Point, in true Tony Stark style. Driven by the endless possibilities in IT, marketing, and branding, I create visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications that not only engage but also convert and scale sustainably.

benefit.flexibility: Flexibility: Whether in a modern on-site work environment or remotely – I happily adapt to your needs and ensure smooth operations.
benefit.openminded: Embracing New Challenges: As a curious professional, I’m constantly seeking new challenges to continuously expand my know-how and develop innovative solutions specifically for you.
benefit.excellence: Creative Excellence: For me, coding and marketing are more than just technical disciplines – they’re creative problem-solving and digital art. I transform complex challenges into simple, user-friendly concepts that sustainably boost your success.

developer.description: → My journey has involved working on a wide range of projects, where I've successfully employed an array of modern frontend technologies and innovative concepts.
developer.description-2: →  I create modern websites, apps, sales funnels, SaaS platforms and web applications that are fast, user-friendly, and built to scale into the future.
developer.description-3: →  I remain curious and open to new technologies and methods, continuously expanding my expertise to stay ahead in the dynamic world of web development.
developer.sub-description: Feel free to reach out – I’m here to support you from the very first idea to the final product, always with transparency, efficiency, and genuine passion.
developer.sub-description-2: I look forward to helping you achieve your goals and making your project a success.

branding.description: → Using a comprehensive approach – from your brand book and guidelines to every detail of your vision, mission, and goals – we craft striking visual identities, strategies, and experiences that captivate your target audience and bring your brand to life.
branding.description-2: → Everyone is unique, and we expertly showcase that uniqueness. That’s our promise. We don’t stop until we have achieved our shared goal.

h3.text-2: Are you ready for a branding solution that clearly sets you apart from the competition?

branding.sub-description: Get in touch – my team and I are excited to work together with you to develop the perfect strategy to elevate your brand to the next level.

marketing.description: → Developing innovative and tailor-made marketing strategies that shine a spotlight on your brand, attract new target audiences, and drive sustainable growth.
marketing.description-2: → With a smart blend of creative ideas, years of experience, precise data analytics, and cutting-edge technology, we transform your vision into targeted campaigns that deliver genuine success.
marketing.description-3: → In doing so, we forge an effective connection between your brand and your audience – achieving measurable results and long-term success.

projects.description: → Experience my projects in action – witness firsthand how innovative digital experiences are brought to life. Dive into a curated selection of my work, interact directly with the projects, and get inspired by what my team and I can create for you.
projects.description-2: → Let your imagination run wild – with us, almost anything is possible. Want to see more? Click on the “More Projects” button for a comprehensive look at our entire portfolio.

join.name: Join CMS
join.description: Streamline your project management with ease! Inspired by the Kanban system, the JOIN Task Manager features an intuitive drag-and-drop interface that lets you create tasks, assign team members, and maintain full oversight – ensuring sustainable success for your business.

pollo.name: El Pollo Loco
pollo.description: An action-packed jump 'n' run adventure built on dynamic, in-depth JavaScript object-oriented programming. Help Pepe collect coins and salsa bottles as he battles a crazy chicken to rescue his beloved Maria – pure excitement and fun guaranteed!

portfolio.name: 15K Portfolio
portfolio.description: A premium showcase of my projects that highlights meticulous attention to detail. Experience 100% transparency and top-quality work – because I value excellence over quantity and collaborate closely with my clients.
